findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in 0x115ec79f1de567ec68b7ae7eda501b406626478e.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.21', '^0.4.23']
	- 0x115ec79f1de567ec68b7ae7eda501b406626478e.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.21
	- 0x115ec79f1de567ec68b7ae7eda501b406626478e.sol#473 declares pragma solidity^0.4.23
findings.name: pragma

findings.message:
